SELECT A.id AS woId, A.wo_code AS woCode, A.status AS woStatus, A.work_date AS workDate,
B.id AS lineId, B.line_name AS lineName,
D.name AS materialName, D.spec AS materialSpec, D.base_unit AS baseUnit,
A.quantity AS plannedQuantity
FROM work_order A JOIN production_line B ON A.line_id = B.id
JOIN line_material C ON C.line_id = B.id
JOIN material D ON C.material_id = D.id
WHERE A.work_date = #{date}
ORDER BY B.line_name ASC, A.wo_code ASC

SELECT PRI.id AS prItemId, PR.id AS prId, PR.pr_code AS prCode,
SOI.item_code AS itemCode, SOI.item_name AS itemName, SOI.unit AS unit,
(PRI.quantity - PRI.produced_quantity) AS remainingQuantity, PR.due_at AS dueAt
FROM production_line PL JOIN line_material LM ON LM.line_id = PL.id
JOIN material M ON M.id = LM.material_id AND M.type = 'MAT_FG'
JOIN sales_order_item SOI ON SOI.item_code = M.material_code
JOIN production_request_item PRI ON PRI.so_item_id = SOI.id
JOIN production_request PR ON PR.id = PRI.pr_id
WHERE PL.id = #{lineId} AND PRI.status IN ('PIS_TARGET', 'PIS_PRODUCING') AND (PRI.quantity - PRI.produced_quantity) > 0
ORDER BY PR.due_at ASC, PRI.id ASC
